Changing content (do it yourself)

For the video, goto https://youtu.be/f92W-mVNUiw

Write code in SaxonJS sothat the text entered in the textarea is copied to the space below it.

You will find the solution in the file changing-content-diy_1_.xslt.

As an extra challenge, you may allow the user to use a limited set of html elements, such as <b> and <i>. You can use parse-xml-fragment() to do that. You may or may not enforce a limitation to certain elements.

You will find the solution in the file changing-content-diy_2_.xslt.
